entry.title: “Does Revelation Hint at a Secret Rapture?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210021)

media:group.media:title: “Does Revelation Hint at a Secret Rapture?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210021)
media:group.media:description:
Does Revelation 5:10 or Revelation 20 hint at a Secret Rapture? Find out the answer to this question—and many more— on this fascinating and fast-paced program with John Dinzey, Shelley Quinn, Jason Bradley, and John Lomacang.
Send us your Bible Questions! By email: BibleQA@3abn.org By text: (618) 228-3975

entry.title: “The Cost of Rest” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4 Q3 2021

media:group.media:title: “The Cost of Rest” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 4 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Cost of Rest”. Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
2 Sam. 11:1–27, 2 Sam. 12:1– 23, Gen. 3:1–8, 1 John 1:9
Memory Text: “Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me” (Ps. 51:10, NKJV).
(July 17–July 23)
Sunday (Ryan Day) - “Worn and Weary” Monday (John Lomacang) - “Wake-up Call” Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - “Forgiven and Forgotten” Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - “Something New” Thursday (Kenny Shelton) - “Reflectors of God's Light”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2021:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ321_04.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

media:group.media:description:

Learn more about the 3 week media fast: https://beltoftruthministries.org/

entry.title: “Born on His wings (Adventist World Aviation)” - 3ABN Today (TDY210034)

media:group.media:title: “Born on His wings (Adventist World Aviation)” - 3ABN Today (TDY210034)
media:group.media:description:
John & Angela Lomacang invite you to join them along with their guests from Adventist World Aviation. Hear from Bruce Wilkerson, Executive Vice President of AWA; Josh Fix, Future Pilot and Mechanic of AWA Nicaragua; and Yosiday Fix, Humanitarian Worker of AWA. They will share mission stories from Nicaragua, about their future mission trip to Guana.
Learn more: https://flyawa.org/
TDY210034

entry.title: Iceberg | Preparing Our People Regarding Their Error (Sermon)

media:group.media:title: Iceberg | Preparing Our People Regarding Their Error (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, Pastor Kenny Shelton will share from the Bible how errors are coming into the church and how we should prepare to meet this "iceberg". These doctrinal errors of lukewarm Christianity are just one warning sign we are living in the last days. The time is now to meet the challenge, get the word out and be obedient to God's Word.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
